EmailTemplate.description: Used to terminate QN partnership with a service center
EmailTemplate.name: BI-EMEA QN Termination Letter EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Termination Letter - QN Contract ({!Qualification__c.Reference_Id__c})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner,
We hereby terminate the above-mentioned Agreement between our companies dated {!Qualification__c.Start_Date__c} by giving you thirty (30) days written notice from the date of receipt of this letter, in accordance with Article 9 thereof. Please return any support material i.e. embosser, warranty cards, quality marks, to DuPont within 14 days.
Very truly yours,
Patrick S. Schriber Director DuPont™ Corian® / DuPont Building Innovations BI-Warranty@dupont.com
